SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SUM(1) OVER(PARTITION BY NULL) AS TOTAL_RECORD_COUNT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC) AS RNUM, TB.* FROM ( SELECT A.HOLY_SEQ, A.HOLY_DT, A.HOLY_NM, CASE A.USE_YN WHEN 'Y' THEN '사용' ELSE '사용 안함' END AS USE_YN, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_DTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS LAST_UPDT_DTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM TSEC_HOLY_INFO_M A WHERE 1=1
AND A.HOLY_DT LIKE '%' || #{params.searchKeyword} || '%'
AND A.HOLY_NM LIKE '%' || #{params.searchKeyword} || '%'
AND ( A.HOLY_DT LIKE '%' || #{params.searchKeyword} || '%' OR A.HOLY_NM LIKE '%' || #{params.searchKeyword} || '%' )
) TB ) TA WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{params.firstIndex} + 1 AND #{params.firstIndex} + #{params.recordCountPerPage} ORDER BY TA.HOLY_DT DESC

#{item}

insert.foreach: MERGE INTO TSEC_HOLY_INFO_M A USING DUAL B ON ( A.HOLY_DT = #{item.holyDt} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.HOLY_NM = #{item.holyNm}, A.USE_YN = #{item.useYn}, A.LAST_UPDT_DTM = sysdate, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{item.userId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.HOLY_SEQ , A.HOLY_DT, A.HOLY_NM, A.USE_YN, A.LAST_UPDT_DTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.FRST_REGIST_DTM, A.FRST_REGTER_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_ESC_HOLY_INFO.NEXTVAL, #{item.holyDt}, #{item.holyNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.useYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{item.userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{item.userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update.foreach: MERGE INTO TSEB_CENTERHOLY_INFO_I T USING ( SELECT B.CENTER_CD, A.HOLY_DT, A.HOLY_NM, A.LAST_UPDT_DTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.FRST_REGIST_DTM, A.FRST_REGTER_ID FROM TSEC_HOLY_INFO_M A, TSEB_CENTER_INFO_M B WHERE A.HOLY_DT = #{item.holyDt} ) C ON ( T.CENTER_CD = C.CENTER_CD AND T.HOLY_DT = C.HOLY_DT ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET T.HOLY_NM = #{item.holyNm} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( T.CENTER_HOLY_SEQ, T.CENTER_CD, T.HOLY_DT, T.USE_YN, T.LAST_UPDT_DTM, T.HOLY_NM, T.LAST_UPDUSR_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_ESB_CENTERHOLY_INFO.NEXTVAL, C.CENTER_CD, C.HOLY_DT, 'Y', SYSDATE, C.HOLY_NM, C.LAST_UPDUSR_ID )
